body:
Nice like to see more "misfit of demon king academy" doujins on here..

Also @Imtired  this doujin works so well because it's a generic fantasy power trip...  now that I think about most sex Doujins are generic fantasy power trips... So it fits in very well... Don't even have to come up with back story or nothing...
The fact that the series tag is broken makes me wonder if there are more of these
Holy shit new fap material just at the right time :)
This would feel better, if the characters, story, and everything else about the show wasn't a generic fantasy power trip.

It's no punishment if she ends up enjoying it, but yeah, nice one. I think the one they gave to her in the original story wasn't enough (albeit fitting, but kinda lacking if you compare it to what he did to that one random stubborn dude in the entrance exam, that shit was brutal), but this is even better, especially if you compound it with the one form the source material (turning her into a half-breed or human or whatever I don't remember well).
Yo, who the heck are putting the tags? There is no ffm threesome here.
